content.para: Release 3.16.1 updates embedded javascript visualizations and brings support for Bing API v7.

td.p: We have updated Circles and FoamTree to address several improvements and bugs that have accumulated.
This update brings support for Microsoft Bing v7.
This release is very likely the last one to support .NET. If you're using the .NET build, consider switching to service mode (Java document clustering server, the DCS).

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA
